item.title: 辉瑞首席执行官称辉瑞易受欧洲关税威胁影响
item.description: 辉瑞公司首席执行官阿尔伯特-布尔拉（Albert Bourla）表示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普可能会对欧盟征收关税，而辉瑞公司在欧盟设有生产工厂，因此辉瑞公司很容易受到影响。【原文：Pfizer Inc. is vulnerable to the possibility that President Donald Trump will place tariffs on the European Union, where the drugmaker has manufacturing plants, Chief Executive Officer Albert Bourla said.】

item.title: 惠普将以 1.16 亿美元收购前苹果经理人创办的 Ai Pin 初创公司 Humane 的部分股权
item.description: 惠普公司将以 1.16 亿美元的价格收购人道公司的资产，该公司是 2023 年底推出的可穿戴 Ai Pin 的制造商。【原文：HP Inc. will acquire assets from Humane Inc., the maker of a wearable Ai Pin introduced in late 2023, for $116 million.】

item.title: 赛勒为比特币再筹 20 亿美元的策略
item.description: 迈克尔-赛勒（Michael Saylor）的 "战略 "公司（Strategy）计划在一次非公开发行中发行 20 亿美元的可转换债务，从而扩展了这家自称比特币财务公司的非常规筹资战略。【原文：Michael Saylor’s Strategy plans to offer $2 billion of convertible debt in a private offering, extending the self-styled Bitcoin treasury company’s unconventional fundraising strategy.】

item.title: 特朗普称可能对汽车、药品和芯片征收 25% 的关税
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统表示，他可能会对汽车、半导体和药品进口征收 25% 左右的关税，最快将于 4 月 2 日宣布。【原文：President Donald Trump said he would likely impose tariffs on automobile, semiconductor and pharmaceutical imports of around 25%, with an announcement coming as soon as April 2.】

item.title: 日本反对党希望利用日本央行 ETF 支付免费教育费用
item.description: 据一位日本最大的反对党官员称，作为货币政策正常化的一部分，该党希望利用日本央行的交易所交易基金来帮助支付免费高中教育的费用。【原文：Japan’s largest opposition party wants to use the Bank of Japan’s exchange-traded funds to help cover the cost of making high school education free as part of the normalization of monetary policy, according to a party official.】

item.title: 美国国会参议员考虑出售无线电频谱以获取 1000 亿美元收益
item.description: 参议院共和党人正在考虑大规模出售无线电频谱，以获得数十亿美元的资金，帮助支付唐纳德-特朗普总统的议程费用，并为无线宽带释放电波。【原文：Senate Republicans are considering a massive sale of radio spectrum intended to generate billions of dollars to help pay for President Donald Trump’s agenda and free up airwaves for wireless broadband.】

item.title: 在埃利奥特的推动下，英国石油公司考虑出售嘉实多润滑油部门
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，激进投资者埃利奥特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management）已持有英国石油公司近5%的股份，该公司正在考虑出售其润滑油业务的可能性。【原文：BP Plc, in which activist investor Elliott Investment Management has built up a nearly 5% stake, is considering a potential sale of its lubricants business, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 能源转移公司泄漏事件凸显美国最严重的燃料泄漏记录
item.description: 根据彭博社汇编的数据，Energy Transfer LP 旗下的 Sunoco Pipeline LP 公司是宾夕法尼亚州一家输油管道的运营商，监管机构称该输油管道泄漏航空燃油的时间超过 16 个月。【原文：Energy Transfer LP’s Sunoco Pipeline LP unit, the operator of a Pennsylvania pipeline that regulators say leaked jet fuel for more than 16 months, spilled more refined fuels than any other operator in 2024, according to data compiled by Bloomberg.】

item.title: 中国呼吁加强联合国，借美国动荡之机采取行动
item.description: 面对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）推出广泛的关税措施并切断美国与这一世界机构的一些联系的举动，中国政府正寻求施加更大的全球影响力。【原文：China’s top diplomat said no country can “go it alone” and called for a stronger UN, as Beijing seeks to exert more global influence in the face of President Donald Trump’s move to roll out broad-based tariffs and sever some US ties to the world body.】

item.description: Wrightson ICAP认为，在债务上限的限制下，重新估价美国的黄金储备可能看起来很诱人，但这将对金融体系产生深远影响，促进流动性并延长美联储资产负债表放松的时间。【原文：Revaluing the US gold stockpiles might look tempting under debt-ceiling constraints, but it would have far-reaching implications for the financial system, boosting liquidity and prolonging the Federal Reserve’s balance-sheet unwind, according to Wrightson ICAP.】

item.title: 美联储主席迈克尔-巴尔称人工智能的速度会带来大规模风险
item.description: 美联储负责监管事务的副主席迈克尔-巴尔（Michael Barr）说，人工智能具有吸引力的属性也同样会带来风险，其速度和自动性会在大范围内产生新的问题。【原文：Federal Reserve Vice Chair for Supervision Michael Barr said the attributes that make artificial intelligence attractive are the same ones that present risk, with speed and automaticity generating new issues at a wide scale.】
